mapper.insert: insert into review( review_no, goods_no, member_no, insert_date, content, rating, store_no ) values( seq_review_no.nextval, #{goods_no}, #{member_no}, TO_TIMESTAMP(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{content}, #{rating}, #{store_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, m.* FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.member_no = m.member_no WHERE r.goods_no = #{goods_no}
select nvl(round(avg(rating), 1),0) from review where goods_no = #{goods_no}
